original:
Lipidology is the scientific study of lipids, a diverse group of biological macromolecules that perform numerous essential functions within the body. Research in lipid metabolism has significantly contributed to the development of therapeutic approaches for various disorders, particularly cardiovascular disease.


Historically, lipidology was often overlooked in comparison to other biomedical fields. The study of oils, smears, and greas
sampled: Lipidology is the scientific study of acids, a diverse group of biological macromolecules that enact numerous indispensable capabilities within the body. Research in lipid metabolism has significantly contributed to the transformation of beneficial approaches for various disorders, particularly cardiovascular disease. Historically, lipidology was often overlooked in comparison to other anatomical fields. The study of oils, smears, plus greas
